title: Media Keys Not Working In Game!
body:
My media keys will not work in game I have tried everything, I've tried everything I could dig up searching the web but all the threads and post are over a year old and none of them seem to solve my issue. I have done everything from binding the keys using my keyboards utility engine and just plain old holding the FN key and hitting the F9 thru F12 keys in game and nothing seems to work at all can someone please help me!

Keyboard is a Corsair Strafe.

replies.body:
TBH I'm not sure how that specific keyboard works at all, and it's likely that League's keybindings are taking precedence over your custom keyboard keybinds. 

I did a little research, and was able to find a rather old article that might have the answers though! Check out the latest comment by mindlessbuddha in [**this thread**](http://forum.corsair.com/v3/showthread.php?p=830178) and let me know if it helps.
